page.title: 02Shopping
page.content: In our village we have five food shops.Wootton Stores and the Post Office are both in Bedford Road.Two shops are in Cause End Road and one in Tithe Barn Road.Wootton Stores sells sweets papers and food.The Post Office sells sweets cards and books.They also sells stamps.Cause End Stores sells sweets and food.They have a butchers at the back of the shop.Tithe Barn Stores sells food, papers and sweets and you can hire a video.The Co_op sells food like lollies, ice_creams and lots of other things. Most people get their shopping from Sainsburys which is in Kempston,about three kilometres away.My mummy goes to Sainsburys once a week.She goes on Thursdays.When she goes in the holiday David and I go with her.
